revision.text:
This is the "testPropertyTemplate" template. returns true (<> 0) if page has property . reverse is optional and should be used as reverse=1 for reversed properties It should be called in the following format: 
{{PropertyTestTemplate
|prop=
|page=
|reverse=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#ifeq:{{{reverse|}}}|1 |{{#ask:[[{{{prop|}}}::{{{page|}}}]]|format=count}} |{{#ask:[[-{{{prop|}}}::{{{page|}}}]]|format=count}} }}

This is the "PolicyInterventionEffectTemplate" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{PolicyInterventionEffectTemplate
|EffectOnComponent=
|Effect=
|Reference=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text.
{{#subobject:EffectOn{{{EffectOnComponent|}}} |HasEffect={{PAGENAME}} |HasEffectOnComponent={{{EffectOnComponent|}}} |HasEffectDescription={{{EffectDescription|}}} |HasReference={{{Reference|}}} }} Component: [[{{{EffectOnComponent|}}}/Policy issues|{{{EffectOnComponent|}}}]]
Effect : {{{EffectDescription|}}} {{#ifeq:{{{Reference|}}}|||
References: {{{Reference|}}} }}

This is the "PolicyInterventionTemplate" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{PolicyInterventionTemplate
|Description=
|Reference=
|Component=
|BelongsToTheme=
|ThemeItem=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#ifeq:{{{Description|}}}|||}} {{#ifeq:{{{Reference|}}}|||}} {{#ifeq:{{{Component|}}}|||}} {{#ifeq:{{{HumanDevelopmentThemeItem|}}}{{{WaterThemeItem|}}}{{{EnergyThemeItem|}}}{{{LanduseThemeItem|}}}{{{NatureThemeItem|}}}{{{FoodThemeItem|}}}{{{AirThemeItem|}}}{{{ClimateThemeItem|}}}|||}}
'''Description:''' {{{Description|}}}
'''Reference:''' [[{{{Reference|}}}]]
'''Is implemented in:''' {{#arraymap:{{{Component|}}}|;|x|[[x/Policy issues| x]]|, }}
'''Associated theme items:''' {{#arraymap:{{{HumanDevelopmentThemeItem|}}};{{{WaterThemeItem|}}};{{{EnergyThemeItem|}}};{{{LanduseThemeItem|}}};{{{NatureThemeItem|}}};{{{FoodThemeItem|}}};{{{AirThemeItem|}}};{{{ClimateThemeItem|}}}|;|x|[[HasThemeItem::x]]|,  }}

{{#ifexpr:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=consistsOfPI|page={{PAGENAME}}|reverse=1}}>0 |

Associated policy response component

{{#arraymap: {{#ask:[[{{PAGENAME}}]] |mainlabel=- |?-consistsOfPI= |format=Plainlist|valuesep=; |link=none }} |;|xx |Component: [[{{#titleparts:xx|1}}]]
Page: [[xx]]
|}} |}} {{#ifexpr:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasEffect|page={{PAGENAME}}|reverse=1}}>0 |

Effects of this policy intervention on components

|}} {{#set:HasDescription={{{Description|}}} |HasReference={{{Reference|}}}|+sep=; |HasComponent={{{Component|}}}|+sep=; }} [[Category:PolicyIntervention]]
